price: Lẹ́yìn náà, A gbé (Ànábì) Mūsā dìde lẹ́yìn wọn pẹ̀lú àwọn àmì Wa sí Fir‘aon àti àwọn ìjòyè rẹ̀. Wọ́n sì ṣe àbòsí sí àwọn àmì náà. Nítorí náà, wo bí ìkángun àwọn òbìlẹ̀jẹ́ ṣe rí.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِم مُّوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِۦ فَظَلَمُواْ بِهَاۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma baʿathnā min baʿdihim mūsā biāyātinā ilā fir'ʿawna wamala-ihi faẓalamū bihā fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-muf'sidīna
